hero.name: Asaad
hero.intro: I build responsive, animated, and user-focused web interfaces using React, Tailwind CSS, and modern frontend tools.
hero.availability: Currently open to freelance projects (landing pages, portfolios, UI builds) and also seeking a junior frontend role or internship to grow under experienced developers.

about.title: About
paragraphs: I’m a junior front-end developer with hands-on experience building modern web interfaces using React, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion.

I focus on creating clean, responsive layouts with smooth animations and reusable components. I enjoy turning designs into functional, accessible user interfaces while keeping code readable and maintainable.
I’m continuously improving my skills by building real projects, studying frontend best practices, and learning how production-ready applications are structured.
Currently, I’m looking for a junior front-end position or internship where I can contribute, learn from experienced developers, and grow into a professional frontend engineer.

proofBlocks.title: UI + Motion
proofBlocks.desc: Smooth interactions, scroll reveals, and clean component systems.

proofBlocks.title: Admin-ready UX
proofBlocks.desc: Dashboards, role-based flows, and content editing patterns.

emailBodyLines: I'm interested in working with you.
Project type (landing page / business site / React UI / fixes):

cards.title: Landing Pages & Marketing Sites
points: Fast loading + clean structure for handoff

cards.title: Portfolio / Business Website
points: Polished UI with strong visual hierarchy

cards.title: Fixes, UI Polish & Animations
points: Bug fixing, layout issues, responsiveness fixes

services.tipLine: Tip: If you have a Figma link, include it in your email — it speeds everything up.
services.sectionDescription: Need a clean, modern website or a React UI built fast and properly? I help individuals and small businesses ship polished interfaces with responsive layouts, smooth animations, and readable code.

processSteps.title: 1) Quick Brief
processSteps.desc: You share goals, references, and a deadline.

processSteps.title: 2) Quote & Plan
processSteps.desc: I propose scope, timeline, and deliverables.

processSteps.title: 3) Build & Updates
processSteps.desc: You get progress updates + a staging link.

processSteps.title: 4) Handoff
processSteps.desc: Final delivery + small tweaks if needed.

howIWork.title: How I Work
howIWork.intro: I focus on clean UI, solid fundamentals, and production-ready habits — not just making things “look good”.
points: Write reusable and readable React components
Use Tailwind CSS for consistency and scalability
Add animations only when they improve UX
Pay attention to spacing, typography, and hierarchy
Refactor code for clarity and maintainability

contact.title: Let’s Work Together
contact.description: I’m available for freelance work (websites, landing pages, React UI builds) and also open to junior frontend roles, internships, and collaborations. If you’re looking for a motivated junior developer who cares about clean UI and code quality, feel free to reach out.
contact.quoteBoxTitle: To get a fast quote, include:
quoteBoxItems: Project type (landing page / business site / React UI / fixes)
Deadline + any reference links (Figma is perfect)
